``saltext-formula``: Salt formula helpers
=========================================

Salt Extension providing supporting modules for formulae. Allows fast and modular layered configuration loading.

Heavily based on the excellent work done in the `template-formula <https://github.com/saltstack-formulas/template-formula>`_.
